pages.text:
&n&6&lDimension:&r&r    &n&lOtherside&r
&n&6&lArea Level:&r&r    &n60 - 75 &r&r
&n&6&lEnraged Area Level:&r &n75 - 95&r
&n&6&lExceptions:&r  &nNone&r
&n&6&lQuests covered:&r  &nAct V;&r
&n&6&lDimension gateways:&r  &nAct V Gateway;
&n&6&lDimension Bosses:&r &nWarden &r

It seems the portal to this dimesion was abruptly closed instead of guarded. It holds much more then just a single Warden, it seems like the portal leads to the Homeland of these 'warden' creatures. All other beings here have similar features, relying on hearing and echolocation.$(br) Dont make a sound unless you are ready for a fight.$(br) On further note it seems that this dimension holds some kind of ancient temple.

pages.title: Getting to the Otherside
pages.text: If you are looking to get to this dimension you need to lay your hands on&n&l Heart of the Deep that is dropped from a Warden and use it to light up portal frame found in Ancient City.&r$(br)Sometimes you can find a portal frame covered in sculk that needs to be cleared out before lighting the portal

pages.name: Otherside Portal
pages.text: This portal cannot be built in survival, you can use visualization to check if anything blocking portal
